name: Control of the Crypt
description: I'm Nushiva and thank you for checking out my GMTK 2020 entry. This is my first jam game so feel free to leave a comment. Control of the Crypt is a turn based dungeon crawler where your controls are your health. Use potions to restore your health or use a turn to switch what key is disabled. The bow is a ranged weapon you can use to defeat enemies from a safe distance. Be careful though, if you pick up a new item you lose whatever you were carrying, so if you have a key, don't lose it!
